title: Ultra-Stability and High Output Performance of Sliding Mode Triboelectric Nanogenerator Achieved by Asymmetric Electrode Structure Design
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D3EE04253G, Paper
Gui Li, Jian Wang, Yue He, Shuyan Xu, Shaoke Fu, Chuncai Shan, Huiyuan Wu, Shanshan An, Kaixian Li, Wen Li, Ping Wang, Chenguo Hu
Sliding mode triboelectric nanogenerator (S-TENG) is a highly efficient technology for harvesting environment mechanical energy due to its advantages of sustainable energy output and simple structure design. However, boosting output...
